lib.name: lib
lib.description: Shared utility functions, constants, and type definitions (automatically installed)

line-chart.name: line-chart
line-chart.description: GPU-accelerated line chart for 100k+ points at 60fps. Primitive architecture with composable components (Root, Canvas, Axes, Tooltip).

scatter-chart.name: scatter-chart
scatter-chart.description: GPU-accelerated scatter plot. Supports variable point sizes, colors, and opacity. Perfect for correlation analysis and cluster visualization.

bar-chart.name: bar-chart
bar-chart.description: GPU-accelerated bar chart with vertical/horizontal orientation. Supports grouped and stacked layouts. Optimized for categorical data visualization.

area-chart.name: area-chart
area-chart.description: GPU-accelerated area chart with filled regions. Supports stacked areas and real-time streaming data. Ideal for time series and cumulative data.

heatmap-chart.name: heatmap-chart
heatmap-chart.description: GPU-accelerated heatmap for 2D grid data. Custom color scales, correlation matrices, and high-density visualizations. Handles thousands of cells with ease.

gauge.name: gauge
gauge.description: GPU-accelerated circular and semi-circular gauge with color zones. Perfect for aircraft instruments, pressure gauges, and speed indicators. Real-time needle animation.

radar-chart.name: radar-chart
radar-chart.description: GPU-accelerated radar display with circular sweep animation. Ideal for air traffic control, weather radar, and sonar visualization. Supports target plotting with intensity.

waterfall-chart.name: waterfall-chart
waterfall-chart.description: GPU-accelerated time-frequency spectrum visualization. Multiple colormaps (viridis, plasma, thermal). Perfect for RF spectrum analysis, audio visualization, and sonar displays.

status-grid.name: status-grid
status-grid.description: KPI dashboard with GPU-accelerated sparklines. Real-time metrics with threshold alerts and status indicators. Ideal for mission control and system monitoring.

timeline.name: timeline
timeline.description: GPU-accelerated multi-lane timeline with event markers. Supports duration spans and event types (info, warning, error, milestone). Perfect for mission logs and flight recorders.

surface-plot.name: surface-plot
surface-plot.description: Three.js-powered 3D surface visualization. Height-mapped meshes with color mapping. Ideal for terrain, medical imaging, and thermal data. Interactive orbit controls.

data-grid.name: data-grid
data-grid.description: GPU-accelerated data grid with virtual scrolling. Handles 100k+ rows at 60fps. Interactive hover, sorting, and row selection. Perfect for telemetry logs, flight operations, and system monitoring.

attitude-indicator.name: attitude-indicator
attitude-indicator.description: GPU-accelerated artificial horizon showing pitch and roll. Essential for aircraft, drones, spacecraft, surgical robots, and any system requiring orientation visualization. Configurable pitch ladder and bank indicator.

compass-rose.name: compass-rose
compass-rose.description: GPU-accelerated heading indicator with rotating compass card. Essential for navigation in aircraft, ships, autonomous vehicles, robotic systems, and directional instruments. Supports heading bug for desired course.

network-graph.name: network-graph
network-graph.description: GPU-accelerated network topology visualization with force-directed layout. Multiple node shapes and status colors. Perfect for system architectures, medical device networks, robotic sensor networks, and fault isolation. Handles 1000+ nodes.
